participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and optimistic, enjoys trying new things and is a little shy about her cooking skills.
participant_1.background: I like to cook. I'm scared of clowns. I live on the third floor in an apartment. I have two roommates. I have two dogs.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and outgoing, loves exploring new perspectives through photography and values family.
participant_2.background: My passion is photography. My favorite color is blue. I am a freshman at NYU. I have two older brothers. I am the youngest in my family.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love photography! I'm always taking pictures of things I see, especially around campus.
That's cool! I like to cook. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun to try new recipes.
I love to cook too! I'm not very good at it either, but it's always fun to eat what I make.
Yeah, it is! So, what are you studying at NYU?
I'm studying business. I want to be a marketing manager one day.
That's cool! I'm studying computer science. I want to be a software engineer.
That's a great field! There are so many different things you can do with a computer science degree.
Yeah, there are! I'm excited to see what the future holds for me.
I'm sure you'll do great things!
Thanks! I hope so!
So, do you live on campus?
Yeah, I live on the third floor of an apartment building.
That's cool! I have two roommates.
I have two dogs!
That's awesome! I love dogs!
Me too! They're the best.
So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go out with my friends, watch movies, play video games, and cook.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do a lot of the same things.
Yeah, it is! I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be good friends.
I think so too!
